item.description:
This will be a fun time!  Bring either an appetizer or dessert to share with everyone.  Dues paying Members $5, Guests $10.  To reserve, call Gail 860-582-8229. 

Directions to 35 Anthony Drive:  I‑84 Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), then Exit 1 (Rt. 177), right onto North Washington Street, at 1st light left onto Northwest Drive, at end right onto Camp Street, left onto O'Sullivan Drive, at end turn right to stop, left onto Brace Avenue, left onto Anthony Drive.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles House Party
